item.title: Münster
item.description: Einleitender Text. Zeichne doch selber: #you-draw-it svg{ overflow: visible; } #you-draw-it .axis{ opacity: .5; } #you-draw-it .line{ fill: none; stroke: black; stroke-width: 3; } #you-draw-it .area{ fill: #eee; } #you-draw-it .your-line{ stroke: #f0f; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 5 5; } var data = [{"debt":17.4,"year":2001},{"debt":32.6,"year":2002},{"debt":34.5,"year":2003},{"debt":35.5,"year":2004},{"debt":35.6,"year":2005},{"debt":35.3,"year":2006},{"debt":35.2,"year":2007},{"debt":39.3,"year":2008},{"debt":52.3,"year":2009},{"debt":60.9,"year":2010},{"debt":65.9,"year":2011},{"debt":70.4,"year":2012},{"debt":72.6,"year":2013},{"debt":74.4,"year":2014},{"debt":73.6,"year":2015}] var ƒ = d3.f var sel = d3.select('#you-draw-it').html('') var c = d3.conventions({ parentSel: sel, totalWidth: sel.node().offsetWidth, height: 400, margin: {left: 50, right: 50, top: 30, bottom: 30} }) c.
